title: BEs still useless, RIOT respect late game player
body:
Hello, riot,

it would be cool if you could give me any motivation in playing your game.

As a late-game player, I have so much BEs and there is nothing that I can buy.

And no, an overpriced ugly Warwick skin does not count. Neither chromas, stupid icons or other useless stuff. For real, who even cares about icons?

Give us the possibility of grinding skins with BEs.

I mean, I have 8 chests and I am not even allowed to spend all my ~200k BEs in key fragments to open them lol. 

I invested so much time and money in this game, I cannot believe there still is no way to getting something useful of grinding.

I hope there will be a useful change which can give me back some motivation in playing.

p.s. even Blizzard allows people to play for skins in HoTs.

Best regards,
Kailyou
